channel.title: Could we have SRL script projects?
channel.description:
You know how SRL is a big project on adding new functions so that scripts can be easier to make and less detectable and solve more randoms... WELL.
Whynot haev SRL script projects where we all concentrate on making 1 or more particular scripts and then send modified versions of them until we finally perfect them.
That way we can have really really REALLy good scripts. :) And we can get the whole community involved... or just the srl community lol. Whatever works. I like the idea, I hope you consider it.
Comments please. :)

item.title: Could we have SRL script projects?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I’m too lazy. Plus Starblaster is too busy. :eek:

He’ll probably see it eventually.

Read full topic

item.title: Could we have SRL script projects?
item.dc:creator: @_DEAD *DEAD*
item.description:
@_DEAD wrote:

i agree, but the rs cheating community is large, just not the scripting community. we need a suggestions board, where people can suggest and vote for needed scripts. ive made a good mouse and almost completed a box solver now, but they wont be used because i didnt realize there were already viable alternatives. once we know what is needed, we can get to work. just hope no lazy ass whores ask for power miners or things, im only interested in making core functions.

Read full topic

item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

umm my play varrock script might become to big for me to handle and its getting ready to be used for SVN…

and when its to big for pyro and i to handle were going to let it become a group project(thats when it turns into play runescape) itll need updating like evewrytime runescape updates f2p… which is a pain in the ass for 2 scripters!

Read full topic
item.source: Could we have SRL script projects?

item.title: Could we have SRL script projects?
item.dc:creator: @roberty_bob roberty bob
item.description:
@roberty_bob wrote:

There are pros and cons of team scripting… I script in an SRL team so have seen advantages and disadvantages. db-cheater’s idea was to create script packs to contain scripts required for the whole skill… example our team’s crafting pack currently has cowkiller/gem cutter/ amulet stringer / craft guild miner etc. so you can level the whole skill with SCAR…

An interesting part of team scripting is people’s different abilities and also different logic for how to do something… it is a great idea to work together though. Making an autoresponder that handles every different skill with muliple emotional subsets with varied and dynamic responses for example… is easier with more people contributing phrases and ideas…

Go for it Ron… An SVN that’s regularly saved is probably the go from our experience.

Read full topic
item.source: Could we have SRL script projects?

item.title: Could we have SRL script projects?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yes. I obtaind this idea, when I saw that we have about 20 or 25 working SRL scripts and I would say 25%-50% are good ones. That’s a very small amount of scripts. We’re a cheating community, and the only way to be able to cheat the game is if we unite.

Read full topic
